com.codenvy.example.swing

Class InfoHashGen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codenvy.example.swing.InfoHashGen

  • public class InfoHashGen
extends java.lang.Object
    InfoHashGen generates the 20-byte SHA1 encoded hash of the info dictionary in the torrent file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InfoHashGen() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String byteArrayToURLString(byte[] in)
      Converts a byte array to a url safe %nn encoded string
      static java.lang.Object[] generate(java.lang.String filePath)
      Generate the 20-byte SHA1 encoded hash of the info dictionary in the torrent file, used to verify the file being requested and downloaded.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • generate

        public static java.lang.Object[] generate(java.lang.String filePath)
        Generate the 20-byte SHA1 encoded hash of the info dictionary in the torrent file, used to verify the file being requested and downloaded.
        Parameters:
        filePath - path to the .torrent file
        Returns:
        Object[0] infoHash as a URL encoded String
